discover.instruction: Read this text about a family. Notice the highlighted words.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай текст о семье. Обрати внимание на выделенные слова.

content.text: Hello! I <highlight>am</highlight> Anna. I <highlight>am</highlight> 25 years old. I <highlight>am</highlight> a teacher. This <highlight>is</highlight> my family. My mother <highlight>is</highlight> Maria. She <highlight>is</highlight> 50. She <highlight>is</highlight> very kind. My father <highlight>is</highlight> Peter. He <highlight>is</highlight> a doctor. My parents <highlight>are</highlight> wonderful people. We <highlight>are</highlight> a happy family. My brothers <highlight>are</highlight> Tom and Jack. They <highlight>are</highlight> students.
content.question: What words come after 'I', 'she', 'he', 'we', 'they'?

points.example: I am a student. / I am happy.
He is tall. / She is a doctor. / It is cold.
You are my friend. / We are happy. / They are students.

points.rule: Short forms: I'm, he's, she's, it's, you're, we're, they're
points.rule_ru: Краткие формы: I'm, he's, she's, it's, you're, we're, they're
points.example: I'm Anna. He's a teacher. They're students.

notice.instruction: Find ALL forms of 'to be' in this text. Write am, is, or are.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди ВСЕ формы 'to be' в этом тексте. Напиши am, is или are.

tasks.text: This is my classroom. It is big and bright. I am a student here. My teacher is Mr. Brown. He is very nice. My classmates are friendly. We are in class 5A. Today is Monday. The lessons are interesting. My favorite subject is English. English is fun!

notice.reflection_question: When do we use 'is' and when do we use 'are'?

exercises.instruction: Complete with am, is, or are.

questions.explanation: My name = it (singular), so we use 'is'
The children = they (plural), so we use 'are'

produce.instruction: Write 5 sentences about yourself and your family using am, is, are.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши 5 предложений о себе и своей семье, используя am, is, are.
prompts: Your job or school (I am a...)
Your family members (My mother is..., My brothers are...)
produce.example: I am Maria. I am 22 years old. I am a student. My mother is a teacher. She is very kind. My father is an engineer. My parents are wonderful. We are a happy family.

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts that use TO BE forms frequently.

texts.title: My Best Friend
texts.content: My best friend is Kate. She is 24 years old. She is from London. She is a nurse. Her job is interesting. Her eyes are blue. Her hair is long. We are best friends for 10 years. She is kind and funny. I am happy when I am with her.

texts.title: Our Classroom
texts.content: This is our classroom. It is big. The walls are white. The desks are brown. Our teacher is Mrs. Smith. She is nice. The students are friendly. We are 20 students in the class. I am happy to be here.

texts.title: My Pets
texts.content: I am a pet lover. My cat is Fluffy. She is white and fluffy. She is 3 years old. My dog is Max. He is brown. He is very friendly. My pets are my best friends. They are always happy. We are a happy family.

texts.title: The Weather
texts.content: Today is Monday. It is sunny. The sky is blue. I am happy. Summer is my favorite season. The days are long. The nights are short. We are on vacation. It is wonderful!

texts.title: My City
texts.content: My city is Moscow. It is very big. The streets are wide. The buildings are tall. I am proud of my city. The people are friendly. The metro is fast. We are happy here. Moscow is beautiful!

grammar_cards.back:
I am a student.

I always uses 'am'

They are my friends.

They/We/You uses 'are'

We are happy.

We uses 'are', not 'is'

grammar_cards.front:
Full form: He is a doctor.
Short form: ?
grammar_cards.back:
He's a doctor.

He is = He's
